trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior of a new type of node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy of nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 为“服务器资源管理器”的“SharePoint 连接”节点层次结构中新类型的节点定义行为。

trans-unit.source: To create a new type of node, implement the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的节点类型，实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: In your implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider.InitializeType%2A> method, you can use properties and events of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition> parameter to define the behavior of your new node type.
trans-unit.target: 实现中<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider.InitializeType%2A>方法，你可以使用的属性和事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition>参数来定义新的节点类型的行为。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Each type of node is initialized by exactly one <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 每种类型的节点初始化只能通过一个<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default icon for nodes that are defined by this node type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由此节点类型定义的节点的默认图标。

trans-unit.source: The default icon for nodes that are defined by this node type.
trans-unit.target: 通过此节点类型定义的节点默认图标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether nodes of this type have no child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此类型的节点是否没有子节点。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether nodes of this type have no child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示此类型的节点是否具有任何子节点。

trans-unit.source: This property can be superseded by extensions to this node type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以由到此节点类型的扩展取代。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name associated with this node type.
trans-unit.target: 获取与节点类型关联的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this node type.
trans-unit.target: 与节点类型关联的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name is displayed in the **Properties** window when nodes of this type are selected.
trans-unit.target: 名称显示在**属性**窗口时此类型的节点被选中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether nodes of this type do not usually have child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示此类型的节点是否通常没有子节点。

trans-unit.source: This property is superseded if extensions to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> are present.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> 的扩展，将取代此属性。

trans-unit.source: A value representing a node type.
